official_title: Efficacy of Digital Breast Tomosynthesis (DBT) in Addition to Standard 2- Dimensional Mammography in Evaluating Extent of Disease in Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients
inclusion_criteria:
* New diagnosis of breast cancer
* New diagnosis if a previous breast cancer patient with negative surgical margins
* Patients willing to sign a written informed consent form
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 25 Years
Must have maximum age of 85 Years
exclusion_criteria: * High risk benign lesions as the primary pathology diagnosis
